attributes.action: David Cameron to tell Sinitta to either get on with it or pack it in
attributes.additional_details:
Sinitta is extremely distracting on Twitter at the moment. Showing a bit of gossip petticoat is all well and good, but we, the British public, demand she either gets on with it or stops immediately.

If she continues to dither around, we ask you - the prime minister, to put her in prison with nothing but a loop of Steve Brookstein singing "Against All Odds" on video.

Thanks
